short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly view progress on your new and used inventory as well as a quick link to see details and update progress.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Recon Link by Simple Recon, you can now quickly and easily access up-to-date information about your inventory going through Recon from any website that you see your inventory on without any additional steps.

Simply install this chrome extension.

Now, when you are surfing, the Internet, any website that is displaying your inventory, this extension will create a quick view and a provide a link in to Simple Recon to see all the progress updates.

All you do is login one time and you are all set.
